ValidationRule.description: When Opportunity is Closed prevent the user from setting a future award date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE,
$Permission.System_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Regional_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Delegated_Admin = FALSE, $Permission.Country_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE,
RecordType.DeveloperName != "Target", IsClosed = TRUE, ISCHANGED(CloseDate), CloseDate > TODAY()
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Award Date cannot be set in the future for Closed Opportunities
